headline: Air Products and Chemicals (APD): Evaluating Valuation After Q4 Results, Cost Reset, and Hydrogen Project Updates
summary: Air Products and Chemicals (APD) released its Q4 2025 results, reporting earnings per share slightly above forecasts and maintaining steady operating margins. The company also announced a 16% workforce reduction as part of a cost-reset initiative. See our latest analysis for Air Products and Chemicals. Air Products and Chemicals’ recent cost reduction drive and positive Q4 results gave investors a reason to pause, but momentum hasn’t yet shifted upward. Its share price is still down over 8%...
